title: League Season
body: When is this season ending? Anyone have a round about date? Also, when are the finals on for the LCS?

replies.body:
The [Finals for LCS](http://na.lolesports.com/) are this weekend.
[WORLDS](http://na.lolesports.com/articles/2015-world-championship-venues) is in October.
Season ends in November (usually November 11th)
Same time it does every year.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4P2NGJXQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-22T05:45:48.853+0000)
>
> Same time it does every year.

not the exact same time, but basically this.
world finals are held around november, season ends around the end of the year.
